Tyanna: Creating scatterplot of iris dataset
```{r}
# loading tidyverse
library(tidyverse)

# scatterplot

scatteriris = ggplot(iris, aes(x = Petal.Length, y = Petal.Width)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Petal Length (cm)", y = "Petal Width (cm)", title = "Petal Length vs Petal Width from Iris Dataset")

scatteriris
```
